(can  be  outdated) .............................. 174  Sources  of  FLACs  for  the  best  quality  for  separation  process ..................................... 175 Dolby  Atmos  ripping ....................................................................................................... 184 AI  mastering  services ........................................................................................................ 186 How  to  get  the  best  quality  on  YouTube  for  your  audio  uploads .......................................... 192 How  to  get  the  best  quality  from  YouTube  and  Soundcloud  -  squeeze  out  the  most  from  the  music  taken  from  YT  for  separation ..................................................................................... 193 Custom  UVR  models .................................................................................... 195 Repository  of  other  Colab  notebooks ........................................................... 196 Google  Colab  troubleshooting  (old) .............................................................. 199  Repository  of  stems/multitracks  from  music  -
